description: The speed sensing subsystem shall measure vehicle velocity with an accuracy of Â±0.5 km/h
The brake control unit shall apply brake force within 150ms of receiving an emergency braking signal
The camera subsystem shall process road lane markings at a frame rate of at least 30 fps
The object detection module shall identify pedestrians with a minimum detection rate of 95%
The thermal management subsystem shall maintain all electronic components within their rated operating temperature
The radar sensor shall detect stationary and moving objects up to 200m ahead of the vehicle
The driver alert module shall generate audible and visual warnings within 500ms of a safety event trigger
The electronic control unit shall process all sensor inputs and produce control outputs within 10ms
The cyclist detection algorithm shall recognise cyclists with at least 90% accuracy at a range of 50m
The hydraulic brake actuator shall achieve a maximum deceleration of 0.8g under full emergency braking
The CAN bus communication subsystem shall transmit sensor data frames with end-to-end latency below 5ms
The display subsystem shall render driver alert messages on the HMI within 200ms of event detection
